item.title: Self-studying Python and Machine Learning: 2018 in review
item.description: .figure p { text-align: center; align: bottom; font-size: 10px; } Both for personal interest and professional development, I started to learn Python and machine learning concepts. This article summarizes my 2018 learning path. Courses In January, I completed the MOOC “Python 3: from the fundamentals to advanced concepts” that I started in November 2017. This MOOC, taught in French by two INRIA researchers, provided me with a very good introduction to the Python programming language: overview of the built-in types, functions, notions of OOP, …
